Line 1: Line 1: â
[[Image:Diana ross.jpg|thumb|250px|right|[[Diana Ross]]' landmark [[1980]] album, ''[[Diana (album)|diana]]'', was her final LP for [[Motown Records]] before leaving for [[RCA Records|RCA]] the following year. ''diana'' was her most successful studio album to date, peaking at number-two on the [[Billboard 200]] chart and selling over five million copies.]]
  â  
This is a listing of all of the solo singles and albums released by [[United States|American]] [[R&B]]/[[soul]] performer [[Diana Ross]]. Twenty-seven of her singles reached the ''[[Billboard]]'' Top 40 in the US; twelve reached the ''Billboard'' Top 10 and six of them reached #1.
This is a listing of all of the solo singles and albums released by [[United States|American]] [[R&B]]/[[soul]] performer [[Diana Ross]]. Twenty-seven of her singles reached the ''[[Billboard]]'' Top 40 in the US; twelve reached the ''Billboard'' Top 10 and six of them reached #1.
